Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Whether a team is assigned to a project

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Whether a worker is assigned to a team

Name: select_feature_for_sprint
Description: Whether a feature is selected for the sprint

Name: select_user_story_for_sprint_backlog
Description: Whether a user story is included in the sprint backlog

Name: set_task_status_done
Description: Whether a task is marked done within the sprint

Name: choose_sprint_goal
Description: Whether a specific sprint goal is adopted

Name: include_feature_in_release
Description: Whether a feature is included in a release plan

Name: set_blocker_resolved
Description: Whether a blocker is resolved this sprint

Name: allocate_budget_to_project
Description: Amount of budget allocated to a project

Name: assign_product_owner_to_backlog
Description: Whether a product owner manages a given backlog

Name: set_worker_availability_percent
Description: Availability percentage for a worker this sprint
